title: Upholstery Sample, 1899
medium:
Medium: linen: gold warp, silk: green weft, silk: white weft (?)
Technique: plain compound satin, twill?
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Sample of a figured silk twill with cotton backing. White twill ground with figure in gold silk and green silk. Vertical repeat of large-scale laurel wreaths. Designed for French embassies.
